mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Gomer, George
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Gomer, George Patient Age: 20. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Incised wound of scalp two inches in extext: 3/4 of inch to left of saggital suture, vertex. Also contusion of left knee. Col[l]ision of cars between Paw Paw and Cacapon stations. Location Wounded: Paw Paw and Cacapon. Date Wounded: 1864/10/19. Nature of Wound: Cars. Result: Returned to duty .
